trans-unit.source: Abstract class that describes input device gestures.
trans-unit.target: Classe abstracta que descreve gestos de entrada do dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Implementations of InputGesture in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] are <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.
trans-unit.target: As implementações de InputGesture no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] são <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: An input gesture can be associated with a command so that when the gesture is performed the command is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Um gesto de entrada pode ser associado a um comando, para que quando o gesto é executado o comando é invocado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> and the [Commanding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>e [descrição geral do Commanding](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputGesture"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputGesture"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputGesture"></xref> matches the input associated with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Determina quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, se especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputGesture"> </xref> corresponde a entrada associada especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The input event data to compare this gesture to.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de evento de entrada para comparar este gesto para.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the gesture matches the input; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o gesto corresponder a entrada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
